thermistors.name: 100kΩ EPCOS
thermistors.notes: Most common thermistor. Best choice for EPCOS thermistors.

thermistors.name: 200kΩ ATC Semitec 204GT-2
thermistors.notes: Less common, used in some specialized applications.

thermistors.name: Mendel-parts thermistor
thermistors.notes: Legacy thermistor from Mendel printers. Rarely used.

thermistors.name: 10kΩ Generic
thermistors.notes: DO NOT use for hotend - bad resolution at high temp!

thermistors.name: 100kΩ ATC Semitec 104GT-2
thermistors.notes: Used in ParCan, J-Head, E3D, SliceEngineering 300°C

thermistors.name: 100kΩ Keenovo (Beta 3950)
thermistors.notes: AC silicone mats, most Wanhao i3 machines. 1% tolerance.

thermistors.name: 100kΩ Hisens (Beta 3950)
thermistors.notes: Up to 300°C - for Simple ONE & All In ONE hotend. 1% tolerance.

thermistors.name: PT100 (Ultimainboard V2.x)
thermistors.notes: PT100 with Ultimainboard circuit. Requires ADC without pullup.

thermistors.name: 100kΩ EPCOS (1kΩ pullup)
thermistors.notes: Atypical - requires changing 4.7kΩ pullup to 1kΩ. Better accuracy.

thermistors.name: 100kΩ Maker's Tool Works
thermistors.notes: Kapton Bed Thermistor - beta 3950

thermistors.name: 100kΩ Formbot/Vivedino 350°C
thermistors.notes: High temperature thermistor - beta 3950

thermistors.name: 4.7MΩ Dyze Design 500°C
thermistors.notes: T-D500 500°C High Temperature Thermistor

thermistors.name: 500kΩ SliceEngineering 450°C
thermistors.notes: 450°C High Temperature Thermistor

thermistors.name: 100kΩ bq Hephestos 2
thermistors.notes: For bq Hephestos 2 printer

thermistors.name: PT100 (1kΩ pullup)
thermistors.notes: Atypical - requires 1kΩ pullup instead of 4.7kΩ

thermistors.name: PT100 (4.7kΩ pullup)
thermistors.notes: Standard PT100 with 4.7kΩ pullup

thermistors.name: PT1000 (1kΩ pullup)
thermistors.notes: Atypical - requires 1kΩ pullup

thermistors.name: PT1000 (4.7kΩ pullup)
thermistors.notes: E3D PT1000 with 4.7kΩ pullup

thermistors.name: 100kΩ Ultimachine Rambo
thermistors.notes: TDK NTCG104LH104KT1 - for Rambo motherboard

thermistors.name: Dummy - 25°C
thermistors.notes: TESTING ONLY - Always reads 25°C or defined value

thermistors.name: Dummy - 100°C
thermistors.notes: TESTING ONLY - Always reads 100°C or defined value

thermistors.name: MAX6675 Thermocouple
thermistors.notes: SPI thermocouple. 0-700°C range. Requires MAX6675 chip.

thermistors.name: MAX31855 Thermocouple
thermistors.notes: SPI thermocouple. -200 to +700°C range. Better than MAX6675.

thermistors.name: MAX31865 PT100/PT1000
thermistors.notes: SPI RTD sensor. Supports 2/3/4-wire PT100 or PT1000.
